description: Requires Node Exporter (https://github.com/prometheus/node_exporter) to be installed on the nodes to be monitored.

targets.expr: max(sum by(job, cluster, instance) (yarn_resourcemanager_queue_max_capacity_mb {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''}))

sum by (job) (yarn_resourcemanager_queue_allocated_vcores {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''} +  yarn_resourcemanager_queue_available_vcores {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''}+  yarn_resourcemanager_queue_reserved_vcores {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''})

1-(sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance)) / (sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance))

1-(sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (yarn_resourcemanager_queue_available_mb {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''})/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (yarn_resourcemanager_queue_max_capacity_mb {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''}))

1-sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (yarn_resourcemanager_queue_available_vcores {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''})/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (yarn_resourcemanager_queue_allocated_vcores {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''} + yarn_resourcemanager_queue_available_vcores {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''} + yarn_resourcemanager_queue_pending_vcores {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''} + yarn_resourcemanager_queue_reserved_vcores {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''})
sum by(job, cluster_id, instance) (yarn_resourcemanager_queue_available_vcores {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''})
sum by(job, cluster_id, instance) (yarn_resourcemanager_queue_allocated_vcores {job="hadoop_yarn_resourcemanager", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', child_queue=''})
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total {job="$job", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$interval]))

1-hdfs_datanode_remaining {job="hadoop_hdfs_datanode", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', kind="FSDatasetState", fsdatasetid=''}/ hdfs_datanode_capacity {job="hadoop_hdfs_datanode", cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', kind="FSDatasetState", fsdatasetid=''}

title: EMRonEC2-Optimization-dashboard
